title: Which League of legends champion's personality ressemble you the most?
body:
I'll play fair and won't use Rubick

{{champion:161}} knowledge, even pointless knowledge attracts me
{{champion:74}} science, this is my life
{{champion:37}} Musique and Quietness, i just want calm

mhhhh.... seems about right

{{champion:161}} Love Knowledge 
{{champion:157}} Overly CRITical of myself (pun intended)
{{champion:238}} Secretly the head of a ninja clan
{{champion:104}} Could use a cigar right about now
{{champion:202}} because I only sleep 4 hours a day

{{champion:157}} Cancer
{{champion:90}} (Space) aids
{{champion:6}} Diabetes

{{champion:157}}/{{champion:92}}: I know I know, you think I am some edgy loser. Honestly, in real life I'm kind of a loner. I don't really hang out with people, but that doesn't really bother me. It is just who I am. I also am someone who is haunted by the mistakes of my past. Nothing on the magnitude of causing someone's death, but those mistakes and regrets are mine and they feel monumental to me. (I think most people are haunted by their mistakes but are not willing to admit it) I also desire to redeem myself and become a better person. At the end of the day, I just want to walk away from life thinking that I am the hero.

{{champion:202}}: I'm someone who gets lost inside his own thoughts and dreams. Sometimes is causes me to miss the world around me. I am also someone that demands perfection from not only the world around me, but also from myself.

{{champion:104}}: Like Graves I have a real bad mean streak. When I get mad, I see red. It takes me a long time to cool down and come back to earth after getting riled up. Also, I am someone who is not afraid of getting violent. Push comes to shove, you bet I am punching back. I won't start it, but I will end it.

{{champion:245}}: Ekko is someone who like me, is constantly searching for perfection in everything. Ekko is so meticulous that he is willing to rewind time over and over again in an effort to get the perfect outcome. Ekko is also someone who is confident in his skill and prowess, but at the end of the day he realizes that he is not immune to failure.

{{champion:117}}  Mania

{{champion:32}}  Depression

{{champion:427}} Weed...
well i wish a greater future :(

{{champion:112}}  Love to invent and want to augment myself.
{{champion:28}} Prefer to hide and only stand out when I'm needed or I see a opportunity.
{{champion:121}} Adapt to the situations without changing who you are.

{{champion:131}} : Weird, kinda dry sense of humor.

{{champion:60}} : Spidery seductress lady person.

{{champion:76}} : Honestly just a big cat pretending to be a human.
{{champion:432}} ♪ ♫

{{champion:78}} 
I tend to always speak negatively of myself despite the fact everyone speaks highly of me.

Despite my low self-esteem, I still try the best I can and attempt to put on a smiling face. 

Also, when people are in trouble, I try to help them out as best I can, even if I can't really help myself in the situation.


Also the reason she's my main.  Her being "OP" just happens to be coincidence. (especially since I continued playing her, even after the nerfs that made her fall out of favor)


I also fell in love with how expressive she was in "A Hero's Calling."  So beautiful.

{{champion:22}} - Natural Leader

{{champion:17}} - Can be annoying at times

{{champion:99}} - Nice 99% of the time. 

{{champion:267}} - I like helping people!

{{champion:25}} / {{champion:10}} - Sibling Rivalry... 

{{champion:43}} - I can be very spiritual at times. Very calm. 

{{champion:37}} - I enjoy music and being quiet.

{{champion:21}} - Only live once, cannot afford to be dumb.

{{champion:240}}

{{champion:33}}OK

######The three only taunts baby

Hmm a couple years ago I am not sure what I would put, but after playing LoL I can say {{champion:44}} without a doubt.  He literally became my role model through an emotionally difficult part of my life.  Helped me realize a couple things about myself and be a lot more open about who I was with the world.  Honestly the reason I both realized and can openly say that I am bisexual, I once again have belief in the good of humanity (seriously though, how many people have you known who gained faith in humankind by playing LoL?) and I try to be a nice person to everyone I meet, both in person and online even if they do annoy me to the point of wanting to scream at them.

{{champion:1}} 
I scream like a little girl as camille is chasing me

{{champion:245}} : I waste too much time and procrastinate all my essays and homework assignments
{{champion:32}} loner
{{champion:427}} : I'm super friendly
{{champion:85}} Sugar is my drug

Older {{champion:18}} - "I wanna shoot something"

{{champion:115}}  - I can't sit still, and explosions are fun to watch.

{{champion:222}}  - can be extremely hyper (she was one of my favorite champions to play for a long time for that reason)

{{champion:112}}   - Some people call me a robot, some call me a genius, I call myself both.

{{champion:32}} - I'm kind of depressing, and I don't have friends.

{{champion:427}} -- Adventurous and carefree most of the time, not a violent person by any means.

{{champion:254}} -- I just do things my way, even if people don't like it. Stick to what I believe in.

{{champion:201}} -- Even if I have no friends, I'm still a very warm, caring person, and I help out whenever I can.

{{champion:163}} -- I'm very enthusiastic about what I do, very curious, and always wanting to learn more -- even though I'm afraid of what'll happen in the future at the same time.

{{champion:78}} -- People always say good things about me, but I know they're wrong. A lot of the things I attempt doing, I mess up at somehow. But, I'm very stubborn, and keep trying anyway.

More or less me.

{{champion:98}} I like to assess the situation before I act fairly.
{{champion:119}} I never shut up and love shouting (I practice my voices).
{{champion:201}} I'm friendly and protective of my friends and loved ones.

{{champion:432}} Like to help people but it always goes horribly horribly wrong
{{champion:429}} Like to rope my friends into bad situations they'd rather not be in cuz if I'm going down you're going down with me
{{champion:427}} If you hurt an animal in front of me so help me God
